name: Scythe Limbs
desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 45%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
